                hue="smoker", col="time",

source.113a9d22: Use hue without changing box position or width
source.40fff225: Draw a boxplot with nested grouping by two categorical variables
source.b0352943: Draw a boxplot with nested grouping when some bins are empty
source.d7b2b32c: Draw a vertical boxplot grouped by a categorical variable
source.dfa7d5a1: Use catplot() to combine a boxplot() and a FacetGrid. This allows grouping within additional categorical variables. Using catplot() is safer than using FacetGrid directly, as it ensures synchronization of variable order across facets
source.b4031345: Use swarmplot() to show the datapoints on top of the boxes
source.1f35c831: Control box order by passing an explicit order
